resources.string: Scanner à partir de la caméra
Lire des informations sur l\'application est les licences open-source
Noter Authenticator Pro sur Google Play
View the Authenticator Pro repository on GitHub. You can report an issue, request more icons and features.

Removing this authenticator will prevent you from generating codes for this account. This does not mean that two factor authentication is disabled.

Deleting this authenticator may prevent you from accessing your account.
Please make sure that either two factor authentication is disabled or that you have the recovery codes.

Continue?
Un nom de fichier est requis
La clé secrète n\'est pas valide
Le code pin doit être composé de 4 caractères
L\'authentificateur doit générer entre {0} et {1} chiffres
Le QR code n\'est pas au bon format ou n\'est pas lisible
Un authentificateur avec cette clé secrète existe déjà
Copiez cet authentificateur vers un autre appareil ou application en scannant le QR code
Les QR codes ne sont pas pris en charge pour ce type
Save all your authenticators, categories and icons to an encrypted backup file. This file can be restored within the app.
Save your authenticators to an unencrypted HTML document with QR codes. To restore, these codes must be scanned individually. Categories and icons are not saved.

Backups to HTML files are unencrypted and may leave your secret keys vulnerable.

This file cannot be restored within the app and does not contain categories and icons. If unsure, opt for encrypted file backup instead.

Continue?
Save your authenticators to an unencrypted plain-text URI list file. This file is compatible with many alternative applications and services. Categories and icons are not saved.

Backups to plain-text files are unencrypted and may leave your secret keys vulnerable.

This file does not contain categories and icons. If unsure, opt for encrypted file backup instead.

Continue?
If you\'re new to Authenticator Pro, view the getting started guide by clicking below.
Vous n\'avez aucune catégorie pour l\'instant
Le nom de la catégorie est requis
Une catégorie avec ce nom existe déjà
Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cette catégorie ?
Des modifications ont été apportées depuis votre dernière sauvegarde
Enter a password to securely encrypt your backup file. If you do not wish to password protect the file, leave the password empty.
Le mot de passe est incorrect ou le fichier est corrompu
You have not chosen a password, your backup will not be encrypted and your secret keys may be vulnerable.\n\nContinue?
Mot de passe de la sauvegarde
Nom du fichier de la sauvegarde
Vous n\'avez aucun authentificateur à sauvegarder
{0} authentificateurs et {1} catégories ont étés restaurés
Restored {0} new authenticators and {1} new categories. Updated {2} existing authenticators.
L\'autorisation d\'accéder à la caméra est requise pour scanner un QR code
Google Play n\'est pas installé sur votre appareil
Erreur lors de la sélection de fichier. Un gestionnaire de fichier doit être installé.
Erreur lors de la sélection d\'un fichier
Le fichier sélectionné n\'est pas une sauvegarde Authenticator Pro
An error occurred when opening the database. Try launching the app again. If the issue persists, clear app data and restore your latest backup.\n\nAlternatively, you can submit an error report.
An unhandled error occurred within the application. Details of the error are below:
Select a location and password for auto backups. Backups are scheduled when changes are made. Cloud storage is not supported, use the backup menu instead.
Non protégé par mot de passe
Sauvegarder automatiquement à l\'emplacement de stockage choisi
Automatically restore the latest backup found in the selected storage location. Useful for syncing between devices.
On some devices, power settings might prevent backups from working correctly. If you are experiencing problems, try disabling battery optimisation for Authenticator Pro.
Échec lors de la sauvegarde automatique
The most recent auto backup failed to complete. File permissions might have expired, try setting the backup location again in the auto backup settings.
Échec lors de la restauration automatique
The most recent auto restore failed to complete. File permissions might have expired or the password is incorrect. Try setting the backup location and password again in the auto backup settings.
Encrypt the database with a password. You will be prompted for the password when you open the app. Leave the field blank to clear the password.
Use a password you can remember, the database is unrecoverable without it!
Les mots de passe ne correspondent pas
Entrez votre mot de passe ou utilisez la biométrie pour déverrouiller la base de données
Utilisez la biométrie pour accéder à vos authentificateurs
Le mot de passe est incorrect
Le fichier n\'a pas pu être importé
Importer un fichier texte clair otp_accounts.json
Liste en texte claire d\'URIs otpauth
Consulter le guide sur le wiki du projet
To add an authenticator, scan the QR code provided by the app or service. It will be added to the list and will generate new codes automatically. You can also enter the details manually.
When logging in, use the unique code provided by Authenticator Pro. It is only valid for a short duration. Tap the authenticator in the list to copy the code to the clipboard.
Rename and customise your authenticators to find them easily. Simply tap the menu icon on an entry and follow the steps.
You can organise your authenticators into categories to find them easily. Furthermore, holding and dragging items will allow you to rearrange them in any order you like.
Don\'t get locked out of your accounts if you change device. Create a backup file and store it in a safe place. A backup can be restored at any time and protected with a password.
If you have a Wear OS watch, you can download the companion app. You can view codes directly on your watch.
Place the QR code in the viewfinder to scan it. The code will scan automatically. Tap to focus.
Try to avoid shadows and glare. Hold the device approximately 6 inches (15 cm) from the code.
Reminds you to backup your authenticators if important changes are made
Automatically backup and restore from a specific location when changes are made. Disables backup reminders.
Choisir une langue à utiliser dans l\'application
Require password to access authenticators. The database will be encrypted with your password.
Sauvegarder avec le mot de passe de la base de données
Encrypt all backups using the database password so you don\'t need to enter it each time
Autoriser le déverrouillage de la base de données avec une authentification biométrique
Set the time after which the database will lock once the app leaves the screen
Hide codes until they are tapped. They will disappear after a few seconds.
Changer le mode d\'affichage de la liste
Choisir une couleur d\'accentuation à utiliser dans l\'application
Thanks for downloading Authenticator Pro.\nKeep your online accounts secure and protected with the best open-source authentication app.
Authenticator Pro is compatible with most providers and accounts. It is 100% compatible with Google Authenticator enabled services.
Backup your authenticators with strong encryption. In case you lose your device, you can always gain access to your accounts. Save to cloud storage or to your device.
Organise your authenticators into categories and even change the order with a simple hold and drag.
If you prefer, you can enable a dark theme in the settings. All icons will adapt to match their new background.
